subject: Yet Another Hackable Box
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I don't want to bore anyone with yet another hack, but i found another 
one that is $29.99 and sounds very similar to the old style RS 469 and 
470.  I bought it and hacked it at the table at the pizza place at 
lunch, it took like 3 minutes to do.  If anybody is interested than 
send me a private e-mail and i will explain further.  I'm 2 for 2 with 
my efforts so far in duplicating the original idea by Sum, maybe i've 
been put on this path by them ????

Thanx Guys,
-Steve H.
